## data

```{r data}
args <- lst(
  region = "LAD",
  sex = "female",
  model = "car_as_at",
)

cause_q <- read_rds(
  here(
    "data",
    "death_rates",
    str_c(
      args$region,
      "_",
      args$sex,
      "_",
      args$model,
      "_",
      "cancers_80q0",
      ".rds"
    )
  )
)

if (args$sex == "male") {
  cause_list <- c(
    "Trachea bronchus lung cancers",
    "Prostate cancer",
    "Colon and rectum cancers",
    "Oesophagus cancer",
    "Lymphomas multiple myeloma",
    "Pancreas cancer",
    "Bladder cancer",
    "Leukaemia",
    "Liver cancer",
    "Kidney and ureter cancer",
    "All other cancers"
  )
} else {
  cause_list <- c(
    "Trachea bronchus lung cancers",
    "Breast cancer",
    "Colon and rectum cancers",
    "Pancreas cancer",
    "Ovary cancer",
    "Lymphomas multiple myeloma",
    "Oesophagus cancer",
    "Leukaemia",
    "Corpus uteri cancer",
    "Liver cancer",
    "All other cancers"
  )
}

IMD <- read_csv(here("data", "covariates", "IMD_LAD2020_2019.csv")) |>
  mutate(`income rank` = rank(`income score`))

lookup <- read_csv(
  here(
    "data",
    "covariates",
    "LSOA_MSOA_LAD_GOR_CTRY_lookup.csv"
  )
) |>
  select(LAD2020, LAD2020NM, GOR2011, GOR2011NM) |>
  distinct() |>
  arrange(LAD2020)

n_lad <- length(unique(lookup$LAD2020NM))

regions <- c(
  "North East",
  "North West",
  "Yorkshire and The Humber",
  "East Midlands",
  "West Midlands",
  "East of England",
  "South East",
  "South West",
  "London"
)

region_col <- c(
  "#1F78B4",
  "#E31A1C",
  "#FF7F00",
  "#B15928",
  "#A6CEE3",
  "#33A02C",
  "#6A3D9A",
  "#FDBF6F",
  "#FB9A99"
)
```

```{r calculate median 80q0 in over time}
median_q <- apply(
  X = cause_q,
  MARGIN = c(1, 2, 4),
  FUN = median
) |>
  as.data.frame.table(stringsAsFactors = FALSE) |>
  as_tibble() |>
  rename(`80q0` = Freq) |>
  mutate(year = as.integer(year)) |>
  arrange()
```

```{r calculate median 80q0 change 2002-2019}
median_q_change <- apply(
  X = cause_q["2019", , , ] - cause_q["2002", , , ],
  MARGIN = c(1, 3),
  FUN = median
) |>
  as.data.frame.table(stringsAsFactors = FALSE) |>
  as_tibble() |>
  rename(d80q0 = Freq)
```

## pair plots

Pair plot of 80q0 in 2019
```{r 80q0 pair plot in 2019}
corr_plot <- function(data, mapping, method = "p", use = "pairwise", ...) {
  # grab data
  x <- eval_data_col(data, mapping$x)
  y <- eval_data_col(data, mapping$y)

  # calculate correlation
  corr <- cor(x, y, method = method, use = use)

  # calculate colour based on correlation value
  # Change this to suit: possibly extend to add as an argument of `my_fn`
  pal <- divergingx_hcl(n = 100, palette = "Temps")
  fill <- pal[findInterval(corr, seq(-1, 1, length = 100))]

  ggally_text(
    label = as.character(round(corr, 2)),
    mapping = aes(),
    xP = 0.5, yP = 0.5,
    color = "black",
    ...
  ) +
    theme_void() +
    theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = fill))
}

p <- median_q |>
  left_join(lookup) |>
  pivot_wider(
    id_cols = c(LAD2020, GOR2011NM),
    names_from = cause,
    values_from = `80q0`
  ) |>
  ggpairs(
    columns = cause_list,
    upper = list(continuous = corr_plot),
    lower = list(
      continuous = function(data, mapping, ...) {
        ggally_points(data = data, mapping = mapping, size = 0.1) +
          theme_bw()
      },
      mapping = aes(color = factor(GOR2011NM, levels = regions))
    ),
    diag = list(
      continuous = function(data, mapping, ...) {
        ggally_densityDiag(data = data, mapping = mapping) +
          theme_bw()
      }
    ),
    labeller = label_wrap_gen(20),
    legend = c(2, 1)
  ) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = region_col, name = "") +
  theme(
    legend.position = "right",
    legend.text = element_text(size = 5),
    legend.key.size = unit(0.01, "npc"),
    strip.text = element_text(size = 3),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 3),
    panel.grid = element_blank()
  )

save_plot(here("figures", "cancer", str_c("pairs_80q0_2019_", args$sex, ".pdf")), p)

p
```


## time series

```{r plot time series}
for (disease in cause_list) {
  print(disease)
  p <- median_q |>
    filter(cause == disease) |>
    mutate(LAD2020 = LAD) |>
    left_join(lookup) |>
    ggplot(
      aes(
        x = year,
        y = `80q0`,
        group = LAD
      )
    ) +
    geom_line(size = 0.1) +
    facet_wrap(
      ~ factor(GOR2011NM, levels = regions),
      labeller = label_wrap_gen(20)
    ) +
    scale_x_continuous(breaks = scales::breaks_width(2)) +
    labs(
      x = "",
      y = "Probability of death",
      caption = disease
    ) +
    theme_thesis() +
    theme(
      panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank()
    )

  save_plot(
    here(
      "thesis_analysis",
      "cancers",
      "figures",
      str_c("series_", str_replace(disease, " ", "_"), "_", args$sex, ".pdf")
    ),
    p
  )
}
```

## poverty

```{r plot IMD}
p <- median_q |>
  filter(year == 2019) |>
  mutate(LAD2020 = LAD) |>
  left_join(IMD |> select(LAD2020, `income rank`)) |>
  left_join(lookup) |>
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = `income rank`,
      y = `80q0`,
      colour = factor(GOR2011NM, levels = regions)
    )
  ) +
  geom_point(size = 0.1) +
  facet_wrap(
    ~ factor(cause, levels = cause_list),
    scales = "free",
    labeller = label_wrap_gen(20)
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Income deprivation rank",
    y = "Probability of death in 2019"
  ) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = region_col, name = "") +
  scale_x_continuous(
    breaks = c(n_lad / 7, 6 * n_lad / 7),
    labels = c("Least deprived", "Most deprived")
  ) +
  theme_thesis() +
  theme(
    legend.key.size = unit(0.01, "npc"),
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank()
  )

save_plot(
  here(
    "thesis_analysis",
    "cancers",
    "figures",
    str_c("IMD_", args$sex, ".pdf")
  ),
  p
)
```

## distribution

```{r calculate quantiles 80q0 in 2002 and 2019}
quantile_q <- apply(
  X = cause_q[c("2002", "2019"), , , ],
  MARGIN = c(1, 2, 4),
  FUN = quantile,
  p = c(0.025, 0.5, 0.975)
) |>
  as.data.frame.table(stringsAsFactors = FALSE) |>
  as_tibble() |>
  rename(quantile = Var1, `80q0` = Freq) |>
  arrange() |>
  pivot_wider(names_from = quantile, values_from = `80q0`) |>
  group_by(year, cause) |>
  mutate(rank = rank(`50%`))
```

```{r distribution plot}
p <- quantile_q |>
  ggplot(aes(x = rank, colour = year)) +
  geom_segment(aes(xend = rank, y = `2.5%`, yend = `97.5%`), alpha = 0.1) +
  geom_point(aes(y = `50%`), size = 0.1) +
  facet_wrap(
    ~ factor(cause,
      levels = cause_list
    ),
    scales = "free",
    labeller = label_wrap_gen(20)
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Ranking of median 80q0 across districts",
    y = "Probability of death"
  ) +
  scale_colour_manual(
    values = c("Grey50", "Grey10"),
    name = ""
  ) +
  theme_thesis() +
  theme(
    legend.position = "top",
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks.x = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
  )

save_plot(
  here(
    "thesis_analysis",
    "cancers",
    "figures",
    str_c("distribution_", args$sex, ".pdf")
  ),
  p
)
```
